name: Companion for CoD Blackout
description:
STATS NOW AVAILABLE!

From the makers of Cheat Sheet for Fortnite comes the ultimate Call of Duty Blackout Companion. This app comes packed full of info for the brand new Blackout mode in Call of Duty Black Ops 4!

Browse through an ever growing list of challenges, items, weapons, and more for you to use to your advantage in Blackout. This app requires an internet connection so we can keep the info up to date.

Features include:  
- Latest Mission Unlocks
- Map detailing each location, zombie spawns, mystery boxes, and more
- Coming soon: View player stats like total wins and K/D ratio
- Weapon lists including Pistols, Assault Rifles, and more!
- Universal app with custom design for iPhone and iPad
- New data added without updating the app!

Download the BEST reference app for Call of Duty Blackout today!

Seejaykay apps and websites are family friendly.

This app and Seejaykay LLC are not affiliated with Activision or Treyarch.
